DOC.brief_title: Exercise Training Treating Diastolic Heart Failure
DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective randomize control intervention study compare two active arm . Eligible patient sample consecutively cardiologist , randomize either high moderate intensity endurance exercise . Endpoints measure baseline , 4 week 7 month . The intervention consider safe , study approve Regional Ethics Committee ( REK-midt ) . This project financially support Norwegian ExtraFoundation Health Rehabilitation EXTRA fund .
